Name: Encore Classic Casino Games
About the game: Step up and place your bets! Encore Classic Casino Games delivers the best Vegas-style casino action for your PC offering a full range of your favorite casino games. With an easy-to-navigate user interface, large cards and fast game play, Encore Classic Casino Games will make you feel like the VIP you are. It's all-or-nothing in this fast-paced collection where you can 'double down' or go 'all in' without breaking the bank. Don't wait for trip to Vegas to play your favorite casino games, purchase Encore Classic Casino Games today! Game Features: Fast Game Play! Play quickly to keep the games exciting! Extra Large Cards Large cards make playing card games enjoyable. Compete With Over 25 Characters Compete against 25 in-game characters. There are so many 'characters' to choose from from a talking bear to a Texas Cowboy, these opponents will have you laughing out loud. Each character has unique strengths, so choose wisely! Play in Tournaments! Tournament play Compete against other players in casino game tournaments. Will you play it safe or go all in? It's up to you! Create Your Own Character! Be the star you are! Choose your hair style, face shape, eye color and outfit. With FaceCreator, you can change your look as quickly as you change your mind. Adjustable Difficulty Levels Hone your skills with the adjustable difficulty levels. Keep up the challenge by choosing difficult levels as you keep improving Free Bonus Game! In-Game Currency Encore Bucks Shop-'till-you-drop with this in-game currency. The more you play, the more you earn! Play All These Great Games! 7 Card Stud Hi Lo Baccarat Blackjack Craps Keno Pai Gow Poker Progressive Slot Machines Roulette Slot Machine Single Line Texas Hold'Em Video Poker Hang 10 Video Slot Machine And Many More
